net.nicoulaj.compilecommand
Class ITAssert

java.lang.Object
  net.nicoulaj.compilecommand.ITAssert

public final class ITAssert
extends Object

Utility for integration test asserts..

See src/main/it/projects/.../postbuild.groovy scripts.

Author:
Julien Nicoulaud
See Also:
maven-invoker-plugin post-build script invocation

          The absolute path to the local repository used for the Maven invocation on the test project.
